body.raw:
# Accordion Accordions display a list of high-level options that can expand/collapse to reveal more information. ## Installation ## Import - **AccordionRoot**: All parts of the accordion are included. - **AccordionItem**: Includes all parts of the collapsible section. - **AccordionHeader**: This item switches the expand/collapse state of the accordion item. This item has a titled element. - **AccordionArrow**: Down arrow icon rotating based on expand/collapse state. - **AccordionContent**: Contains the collapsible content for an item. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { Accordion } from '@melio-ui/accordion';
Panel Title1
 Content1 ; ``` > 'use client' must be used when rendering on the server side. ## API Reference ### AccordionRoot All parts of the accordion are included. How to render accordion item.

selecting: Rendering only the currently expanded accordion item.
selected: Rendering accordion items that have been expanded.
force: Rendering all accordion items. ), }, { name: 'onValueChange', required: false, type: '(value: ExpandedValueType) => void', description: 'The callback invoked when expanded or collapsed an accordion item.', }, ]} /> ### AccordionItem Includes all parts of the collapsible section. React.ReactNode)', description: 'children of accordion item', }, ]} /> ### AccordionHeader This item switches the expand/collapse state of the accordion item. This item has a titled element. ### AccordionContent Contains the collapsible content for an item. ### AccordionArrowIcon Down arrow icon rotating based on expand/collapse state. ## Examples ### Expanded by defaultValue ```jsx render=true const DefaultValue = () => { return (
